title: (x) Departures Magazine Party Invite Font ID - Neutraface w/ Display Numerals {Greg Shutters, Marc O}
content:
Does anyone recognize "The Spring Fashion Issue"?  
Thanks!  
jd

author: Jennifer E. Dahl

comments.content:
are the numerals also Neutraface?

6:30 PM

Good question! My client was only coveting the display copy but... who can call the numerals???

As an aside...I ended up using Archer for this project. More appropriate for the "cherry blossom" theme, but this is what the client was initially interested in...

Those are the Neutraface Display Numerals. Try 'em here:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016015912/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface")
